abstract: Protesters in Republic of Congo say police officers killed at least four people in capital city of Brazzaville; were demonstrating against removal of term limits for Pres Denis Sassou-Nguesso.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of people were protesting a referendum planned for Sunday on removing term limits for President Denis Sassou Nguesso.

headline.main: Republic of Congo: 4 Protesters Killed in Police Clashes
headline.print_headline: Africa; Republic of Congo: 4 Protesters Killed in Police Clashes

snippet: Thousands of people were protesting a referendum planned for Sunday on removing term limits for President Denis Sassou Nguesso.
